title: DEAL ALERT: Get Samsung’s Affordable Galaxy Buds FE for Just $69.99!
description: The Galaxy Buds FE come with all the usual features you'd expect from a modern pair of wireless earbuds. The post DEAL ALERT: Get Samsung’s Affordable Galaxy Buds FE for Just $69.99! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: The Galaxy Buds FE come with all the usual features you'd expect from a modern pair of wireless earbuds.
text: If you’re looking for relatively-affordable wireless earbuds, then the Samsung Galaxy Buds FE are undoubtedly easy on the wallet. Part of the Samsung “Fan Edition” range of products, the earbuds are on sale right now for as much as 30% off, bringing down their price even lower than usual. The Galaxy Buds FE come with all the usual features you’d expect from a modern pair of wireless earbuds, including support for active noise cancellation, voice assistant functions, touch controls, multi-device connectivity, as well as a comfy design and battery life that can last for up to a maximum of 30 hours. You can check them out with the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
If you’re looking for relatively-affordable wireless earbuds, then the Samsung Galaxy Buds FE are undoubtedly easy on the wallet. Part of the Samsung “Fan Edition” range of products, the earbuds are on sale right now for as much as 30% off, bringing down their price even lower than usual.

The Galaxy Buds FE come with all the usual features you’d expect from a modern pair of wireless earbuds, including support for active noise cancellation, voice assistant functions, touch controls, multi-device connectivity, as well as a comfy design and battery life that can last for up to a maximum of 30 hours. You can check them out with the link below.

Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
